DOC.brief_title: An Online Study Reliability Brain Performance Test ( BPT )
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomized online study participant invite take version Brain Performance Test ( BPT ) two consecutive day . In parallel , current Lumosity subscriber invite take BPT begin premium Lumosity experience every 10 week .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Electronically sign inform consent Englishspeaker Current Lumosity free user ( testretest portion ) OR current Lumosity subscriber ( longitudinal portion ) Visual physical impairment impedes computer use completion Under 18 year age
